name: Super Coin Drop
description:
THE OBJECTIVE OF THE GAME

IS TO PUT THE COIN IN THE

COIN SLOT BEFORE TIME RUNS OUT

CONTROL THE COIN BY ROTATING THE GREEN PLATFORMS

PRESS THE LEFT ARROW KEY (OR CLICK IN THE LEFT AREA OF THE SCREEN) TO ROTATE THE PLATFORMS COUNTERCLOCKWISE

PRESS THE RIGHT ARROW KEY (OR CLICK IN THE RIGHT AREA OF THE SCREEN) TO ROTATE THE PLATFORMS CLOCKWISE

RED PLATFORMS CAN NOT BE CONTROLLED

YOU LOSE A LIFE IF

- FALL OFF SCREEN

- TIME RUNS OUT

- HIT ANY PLATFORM WITH TOO HIGH SPEED

EXTRA KEYS:

+/- TO ADJUST THE SOUND LEVEL

M TO ENABLE/DISABLE SOUND

R TO STOP AND RETRY THE LEVEL

ESC TO QUIT TO THE MAIN MENU
